SignIn.title: Club Dashboard
SignIn.subtitle: Sign in as an admin to your club.
SignIn.tos_text_pre: By signing in, you agree to our
SignIn.tos: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
SignIn.layoutDescription: Manage your club's activities, members, and billing all in one place.

NotFound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

Redirect.message: You are not allowed to access this page.

DeleteUserModal.title: Delete Member
DeleteUserModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete the member {name}? This action cannot be undone.

WatersPage.title: Waters
WatersPage.pageDescription: The changes may take up to an hour to appear in the app.
WatersPage.name: Name

AddRiver.title: Add a River to your Club
AddRiver.description:
Select the <drawTool>drawing tool</drawTool> and draw the river path on the map. After drawing, use the <selectTool>select tool</selectTool> to click on the river and provide additional information. Only so, you can save the river!
Tip: With right-click you can delete points.

AddLake.title: Add a Lake to your Club
AddLake.description:
Select the <drawTool>drawing tool</drawTool> and draw the lake area on the map. After drawing, use the <selectTool>select tool</selectTool> to click on the lake and provide additional information. Only so, you can save the lake!
Tip: With right-click you can delete points.

AddZone.title: Add an additional no-fishing Zone to your Club
AddZone.description:
Select the waterbody where you want to draw a no-fishing zone onto. Afterwards select the <drawTool>drawing tool</drawTool> and draw the no-fishing zone on the map. After drawing, use the <selectTool>select tool</selectTool> to click on the zone and provide additional information. Only so, you can save the zone.
Tip: With right-click you can delete points.

AddWaterModalLake.title: Add new Waterbody
AddWaterModalLake.subText: Set a name for the new waterbody and save it as a draft for your club. You can add further details in the water overview tab.
AddWaterModalLake.name: Name
AddWaterModalLake.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of the waterbody

AddWaterModalRiver.title: Add new river
AddWaterModalRiver.subText: Set a name for the new river and save it as a draft for your club. You can add further details in the water overview tab.
AddWaterModalRiver.name: Name
AddWaterModalRiver.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of the river

AddWaterModalZone.title: Add new no-fishing zone
AddWaterModalZone.subText: Save the currently selected area as a no-fishing zone, for the currently selected waterbody.

EditWaterModal.title: Edit waterbody
EditWaterModal.subText: Adjust the body of water here. Changes may take up to an hour to appear in the app.
EditWaterModal.name: Name
EditWaterModal.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of the body of water
EditWaterModal.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description of the body of water
EditWaterModal.fishTypes: Fish Types that can be catched
